page.title: 08Clubs in Willingham
page.content: There is a wide variety of organisations in the village. The sports clubs include{football, {tennis and bowls. The Primary School has a{School {Association}which organises a Saturday Morning Activity Club for the children. There is a{Disco Club}for younger children at the Social Club. The{Workers' Educational Association and{Keep Fit}make use of the school hall, as does the{Evening Institute, which is based upon the Village College at Cottenham. There is a drama group called{Wamads. The{W.I., Red Cross and British Legion all have groups in the village. The{Willingham British School Trust gives grants to groups and individuals for educational purposes from money invested with the Charity Commissioners
